body: as discussed here https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/846#issuecomment-215633754, the "fix" introduced in https://github.com/LLNL/spack/pull/751 does not actually work. Therefore better revert it  and add a comment on possible pitfalls and workarounds.
title: openblas: use spack_cc/spack_f77 and add a note on compiler mixing
